latex:
Through the use of theorems on logarithms\\
\[ \log{\frac{a}{b}} + \log{\frac{b}{c}} + \log{\frac{c}{d}} - \log{\frac{ay}{dx}}\]\\
can be reduced to:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  \log{\frac{y}{x}}\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ \log{\frac{x}{y}}\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 1\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 0\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ \log{\frac{a^2y}{d^2x}}$
